name: DynamicViewContent
desc: A type of view that generates views from an underlying collection of data.

items.name: associatedtype Data : Collection
items.desc: The type of the underlying collection of data.

items.name: func onDelete(perform: Optional<(IndexSet) -> Void>) -> some DynamicViewContent
items.desc: Sets the deletion action for the dynamic view.

items.name: func onInsert(of: [UTType], perform: (Int, [NSItemProvider]) -> Void) -> some DynamicViewContent
items.desc: Sets the insert action for the dynamic view.

items.name: func onMove(perform: Optional<(IndexSet, Int) -> Void>) -> some DynamicViewContent
items.desc: Sets the move action for the dynamic view.
